title: Hi All, I have Curse Club that will be beneficial if YOU join!
body:
Hi All, 

As you see in the title I have made a Curse Club.

It is Called "League Of Legends Oceania" - Not Official.
I think it would be Very Helpful and Beneficial too both of us if you join,
and All that are currently in.

If you show me your In game Rank I can set it in the club so people will see
Your glorious And hard worked rank for others too see.

I will be needing Moderators and Admins for this club soon as It will need managing.
It is a great way for you too 
* Connect With Other Oce Summoners.
* Talk and Chat about upcoming events or News.
* Meet new Players who are an equal level of skill with you too play ranked & Normals with.
* Get Advice Off other players and Learn things!
Many More!

But In return I ask that you be 
* Friendly & Understanding of the actions you and others do.
* You Share advice and Knowledge with fellow players too make the experience in this chat good.
* You always keep a positive attitude while Communicating With others.
* No Swearing, Name Calling & Comments of any bad behavior.

Now I know Alot of people do not like curse or dont have it, And the answer is simple
If you want to join then **Get Curse!**
I promise it will not be a waste of time, As I can do things Like giveaways, Polls & many more.

Please think about it, and please take this Forum as a gesture of my Invitation and Nothing negative! :)
- RedPandaFox

replies.body: This sounds like a great idea, will it take time to be invited into the group?
Not at all, Just get curse and click the link! :)
There will Be Giveaways Of RP codes.
if i get curse and try to apply tobe a mod or admin is there going to be an application form for me to fill out?
No Apps Or silly Forms, If I feel like you are showing excellent vibes and invite alot of people then I will do it without you even knowing x)
ok,  essentially ill just post in every group i know lol
